fields.name: McScruff
fields.value: Hi All, Im Scruff and latest Mod in here, I have a Lenovo 500e and use my chromebook for its great battery life, the ability to run Android and Linux applications.  I have been a Linux user for over 15 years and after many years distro hopping im all about workflow now.  In my day to day job I own my own pub so if in a conversation i go stop typing bare with me.  Im usually around just @ me if you need anything unless its a Saturday night then be prepared for unreadable answers.  In my free time i like to.... Whats free time?  Tattoos and beards are life without either you may be seen as normal
